entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
